windows.comment: Fixes impossibility to run Python plug-ins (#13170)
Fixes impossibility to run Python plug-ins (#13170)

macos.comment: Fix missing Colors dockable modules (#13146)
Fix missing Colors dockable modules (#13146)
Fixes a packaging bug because of which GIMP could only run on the latest macOS version.
Fixes a packaging bug because of which GIMP could only run on the latest macOS version.

windows.comment: Fix security issues in Ghostscript (CVE-2023-36664), OpenSSL (#9397 and more fixed in 3.1.2) and GExiv2 (#8816); babl and GEGL updated; new experimental ARM-64 build in the same all-in-one installer; clean out unused dependencies

Fix security issues in Ghostscript (CVE-2023-36664) and OpenSSL (#9397 and more fixed in 3.1.2); babl and GEGL updated; new experimental ARM-64 build in the same all-in-one installer; clean out unused dependencies

macos.comment: Fix security issues in GExiv2 (#8816)
Fix security issues in GExiv2 (#8816)
Fix security issues in Ghostscript (CVE-2023-36664)
Fix security issues in Ghostscript (CVE-2023-36664)
Updated Cairo to fix a memory leak (issue #9278)
Updated Cairo to fix a memory leak (issue #9278)
Updated babl and GEGL (issue #8281); package split in an Intel and Apple Silicon DMG variants
Updated babl and GEGL (issue #8281); first Apple Silicon DMG package for stable GIMP branch
Backported fix for invisible selection (marching ants) on Big Sur (issue #5952).

windows.comment: Backported GLib fix for very slow file dialogs (issue #913) and custom GTK2 fix for non-functional Wacom Airbrush finger wheel (issue #6394).
Custom GTK fixes for issues like drag&drop with certain screen grabbers (issue #1082), tiny SVG icons (issue #1563) and pasting images from some other applications (issue #3481).
Fixes issue #6664: Script-Fu crashes on 64-bit systems.
Known issue #6664: Script-Fu crashes on 64-bit systems.

macos.comment: Performance improvements on Big Sur and on previous macOS versions
Some performance improvements on Big Sur, possible regressions reported on older macOS (use Revision 1 instead if it's your case)
GIMP 2.10.22 build for macOS - has known performance issues on Big Sur
GIMP 2.10.22 build for macOS - not notarized yet, so you'll see the 'Can't be opened because Apple cannot check it for malicious software' dialog
Experimental GIMP 2.10.22 build for macOS - not notarized yet, so you'll see the 'Can't be opened because Apple cannot check it for malicious software' dialog

windows.comment: Slightly faster and smaller due to optimized build parameters
Fixes GEGL issue #231, which caused corrupted images once the swap file size reached 2 GiB
Fixes issue #4758, a libopenblas-related problem in foreground extraction on 32-bit MS Windows platforms

macos.comment: Fix security issues in GExiv2 (#8816) and a crash in macOS 10.13
Fix security issues in GExiv2 (#8816) and a crash in macOS 10.13
Fix security issues in Ghostscript (CVE-2023-36664)
Fix security issues in Ghostscript (CVE-2023-36664)
Fixes unresponsive interface in macOS Ventura (issue #8784)
Fixes unresponsive interface in macOS Ventura (issue #8784)

windows.comment: Updated babl to fix crash because of wrong SIMD detection (issue #7919)
Release notes are properly shown in Welcome dialog.

macos.comment: First development release for macOS in 2.99 series

windows.comment:
Warning: JPEG, PNG, TIFF and FLI export are not working!
Update: adds the Paint Select tool in the Playground preferences
